professional_summary.experience: Driving product-led transformation with 4 years of experience in technical product development, underpinned by a strong foundation in data analytics and insights.
professional_summary.specialization: Specialized in backend systems, API integrations, and cross-functional leadership.
professional_summary.approach: My approach is grounded in strategic and commercial thinking, ensuring decisions about how systems are built and evolve are aligned with user needs and business objectives.
professional_summary.key_strengths: Known for fostering collaboration, leveraging data-driven insights, and delivering impactful, meaningful outcomes.
professional_summary.values: Authenticity, transparency, and accountability guide my approach to collaboration and creating impactful solutions.
professional_summary.personal_project: Currently building a mobile app in Flutter (Dart), focused on supporting users' personal growth.

leadership.description: Experience creating product roadmaps aligned with business goals, ensuring clear priorities and deliverable timelines for cross-functional teams.
Skilled in fostering collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to gather insights, secure buy-in, and align on strategic objectives.
Proven ability to lead diverse teams of engineers, QAs, and designers, driving value through effective communication, accountability, and shared goals.

technical.description: Collaborated with engineering teams to define and prioritize API requirements, ensuring seamless integration between systems.
Partnered with backend developers to design scalable systems, ensuring alignment with business needs and technical feasibility.
Developed a suite of data products, including dashboards, reporting tools, and their supporting cloud architectures to provide stakeholders with actionable insights.
Ability to query and analyze data using SQL to generate insights that inform product decisions.

achievements: Transitioned Molo to a product-led framework, implementing a prioritisation framework, KPIs and customer feedback channels.
Transformed the squad from a siloed and inconsistent team into one driven by accountability and collaboration, fostering a high-performing and supportive environment.
Introduced a more focused and structured way of working, ensuring teams prioritized the right initiatives and minimized distractions.
Developed a framework for reviewing and maintaining integrations, reducing risk and enabling cost savings by sunsetting low-value systems.
Took ownership of understanding integration data to identify smarter ways to leverage it for driving business value.
Redesigned the architecture of the credit decisioning model’s data storage, enabling Molo to analyze results more efficiently and streamline operations, enhancing overall efficiency.
Secured buy-in to transform a complex Excel-based insights report into a scalable suite of data products to support strategic decision-making.
Built and led two squads (15 members) comprising data engineers, QAs, BAs, and data visualization specialists to deliver the initiative.
Defined the data architecture, secured approval for required third-party integrations, and optimized the pipeline to maximize business value.
Deployed a suite of data products that democratized data access through advanced visualization tools and supported core AI models leveraged across the Marketing group.
Delivered never-before-seen service revenue metrics, driving AI-driven commercial decision-making.
Gathered business requirements to identify key focus areas for improvement, leveraging SQL for data analysis to uncover actionable insights.
Identified drivers for cancellations in BT broadband and developed a dashboard to track the impact of solutions, enabling targeted interventions and measurable improvements.
Transformed the team’s ethos from reporting to delivering actionable insights by introducing training on requirements gathering, commercial analytics, and data storytelling.
Specialized in understanding consumer wants, needs, and trends in the broadband and mobile markets.
Supported product teams by conducting comprehensive user research and providing valuable insights throughout the entire product development lifecycle, from ideation to delivery.
Shaped product strategies to ensure alignment with consumer demands and market trends, enhancing market relevance and success.
Delivered actionable insights that informed go-to-market strategies, contributing to the successful launch of new products.

projects.title: Independent App Developer
projects.description: Designing a mobile app using Flutter to help users set meaningful, values-based goals. The app leverages the OCEAN Personality Framework and behavioral principles to guide users toward self-discovery. Responsible for E2E research, design, development, testing and deployment

personal_interests: Outdoor adventures with my partner and dog
